statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 2 \\ -4 \\ 1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 20 \\ 4 \\ -10 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -15 \\ -14 \\ 6 \\ 3 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
